response.overview: Told through the eyes of Wenzle, an unsung hero tortured by a life of neglect and abuse, we are drawn into a hauntingly abstract dystopian world. Resigned to his daily torment, Wenzle drifts through existence, until a stranger enters his life, igniting hope and revealing a glimpse of a world that might hold beauty after all. Could this be his chance to escape, or is it just another illusion?
response.title: if possible
